question: Which passenger has the longest total flight time in October 2024?
query:
SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, SUM(f.scheduled_arrival - f.scheduled_departure) AS total_flight_time
FROM postgres_air.passenger p
JOIN postgres_air.boarding_pass bp ON p.passenger_id = bp.passenger_id
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON bp.booking_leg_id = bl.booking_leg_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
WHERE f.scheduled_departure >= '2024-10-01' AND f.scheduled_departure < '2024-11-01'
GROUP BY p.passenger_id, p.first_name, p.last_name
ORDER BY total_flight_time DESC
LIMIT 1;
